metadata.author: pokemon
metadata.description: The original Pokémon TCG set that started it all
metadata.notes: Sample file containing Alakazam from Base Set

cards.name: Alakazam

ability.name: Damage Swap
ability.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokémon to another as long as you don't Knock Out that Pokémon. This power can't be used if Alakazam is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

cards.description: Its brain can outperform a supercomputer.
